name: Puleng
summary: On a small Kalahari farm things look bleak. It hasn't rained for ages and the well has run dry and the residents are just about hanging on with what little they have. As the farmers' daughter prepares to gamble on the final few seeds they have left something appears on the horizon which could be the salvation they have been praying for.
info:
• 中文名: 普兰村的奇迹
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 2004-11-10
  • 片长: 3min
  • 制片国家/地区: 英国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 导演: Ali Taylor
